casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Indenture
v.
Frederick B. CORNELIUS et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 15, 2019 Frederick B. Cornelius, self-represented, in support of the petition. Christopher J. Picard, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 42458) is denied.
